Bapp helps businesses to get bookings online.

How does it work?

Build your catalogue

List your services catalogue and working hours on Bapp

Integrate your CTAs

Integrate your booking url with your digital channels and ads

Get bookings

View, accept and manage bookings on Bapp Partner website and app

Your data privacy is our responsibility

We believe that trust is paramount in a relationship. We do not own or sell your data, and we most certainly do not bank on advertising-based business models. The only way we make money is from the software license fees you pay us.

Who is Bapp for?

Bapp booking engine can be used for a wide variety of business types

Salons & Spas

Beauty Parlors, Nail Salons, Hair Salons, Spas etc

Clinics

Dentists, beauty clinics, ayurveda, accupuncture etc

Venues & Equipments

Equipement rentals, jetski rentals, yacht rentals, bike rentals etc

Service Centers

Carwash, auto repair, car detailing, auto consultants etc

Training Professionals

Yoga trainers, fitness trainers, classes etc

Experience Providers

Desert safari, balloon rides, helicopter tours, skydiving etc

Bapp for Large Businesses

We serve medium and large enterprises with white label, on premise software. Your server, your data, your own apps with our world-class tech and support.
